Class AbstractSynchedPipe<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • teetime.framework.AbstractPipe<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the elements which this pipe should transfer.
    All Implemented Interfaces:

    Deprecated.

extends AbstractPipe<T>

        public void sendSignal(ISignal signal)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: IPipe
        A stage can pass on a signal by executing this method. The signal will be sent to the receiving stage.
        Parameters:
        signal - The signal which needs to be passed on.
